# Day 9 - Advent of Code

You can find the link for day 9, 2022 [here](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/9). This folder will provide complete solutions for part 1 and part 2 of day 9.

NOTE: This code was copied from Reddit User [Jekhi5](https://topaz.github.io/paste/#). (I struggled on this one and needed help...)

## Setup

To run this code, you should get the input from [this link](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/9/input) and paste it into `ropes.txt` but my input is already provided as a sample. You should also make sure to have Python installed (I use Python 3.10.7 but it should work with most versions).

# Run The Code

```bash
python3 ./rope-bridge.py
```
